def candidate(char):
    # Check if char is a string with length 1
    if not isinstance(char, str) or len(char) != 1:
        raise ValueError("Input must be a single character")

    # Use ord() to get the ASCII value of the character
    ascii_value = ord(char)

    return ascii_value
